endereyes.abyss.name: Abyss Eye
endereyes.abyss.description.1: Beneath the oceans of the Overworld you can find the Sunken City.
endereyes.abyss.description.2: There you will find the Leviathan... waiting for you.
endereyes.black.name: Black Eye
endereyes.black.description.1: Search old sunken ships and buried chests in the vast seas of Overworld.
endereyes.black.description.2: Some pirates may have it stored inside a treasure on their ships.
endereyes.cold.name: Cold Eye
endereyes.cold.description.1: In the snow of the Overworld during the night is where the Iceologer roam.
endereyes.corrupted.name: Corrupted Eye
endereyes.corrupted.description.1: Like a plague at their Outposts across the Overworld,
endereyes.corrupted.description.2: pillagers guard what you long to find.
endereyes.cursed.name: Cursed Eye
endereyes.cursed.description.1: Explore the bastions down below the Nether to their very core.
endereyes.evil.name: Evil Eye
endereyes.evil.description.1: Defend a village from an Illager Raid
endereyes.evil.description.2: and the Cleric will decide if you are worthy of the reward.
endereyes.exotic.name: Exotic Eye
endereyes.exotic.description.1: Infuse an Ender Eye with a Bubble, Fire, Horn and Tube coral each,
endereyes.exotic.description.2: two Conduit and two Glow Ink Sac.
endereyes.flame.name: Flame Eye
endereyes.flame.description.1: Summon me in the Burning Arena deep in the Nether.
endereyes.flame.description.2: Prove to me that you are worthy or perish in the flames.
endereyes.guardian.name: Guardian Eye
endereyes.guardian.description.1: Rulers in their Temples beneath the Ocean,
endereyes.guardian.description.2: the Elder Guardian waits patiently for their untimely victims.
endereyes.lost.name: Lost Eye
endereyes.lost.description.1: Find it deeper in the Overworld, exploring Mineshafts
endereyes.lost.description.2: and searching through its abandoned chests.
endereyes.lucky.name: Lucky Eye
endereyes.lucky.description.1: Inside the Colosseum, somewhere in the Overworld,
endereyes.lucky.description.2: you must face Dame Fortune. Good luck.
endereyes.magical.name: Magical Eye
endereyes.magical.description.1: During the fervor of a Raid or in the Mansions you can find the Evoker
endereyes.magical.description.2: waiting for you to seal its fate.
endereyes.mech.name: Mech Eye
endereyes.mech.description.1: Inside the caves of the Overworld, an Ancient Factory shelters a
endereyes.monstrous.name: Monstrous Eye
endereyes.monstrous.description.1: In the hottest part of the Nether you will find the
endereyes.monstrous.description.2: Netherite Monstrosity, in the mythical Black Soul Smith.
endereyes.mossy.name: Mossy Eye
endereyes.mossy.description.1: Inside the Colosseum, somewhere in the Overworld,
endereyes.mossy.description.2: you must face the Swampjaw. Smells fishy.
endereyes.nether.name: Nether Eye
endereyes.nether.description.1: Venture to a Fortress in the Nether and find it among its treasures.
endereyes.desert.name: Desert Eye
endereyes.desert.description.1: A Cursed Pyramid rises in the deserts of the Overworld.
endereyes.desert.description.2: There, the Ancient Remnant awaits defiantly.
endereyes.parasite.name: Parasite Eye
endereyes.parasite.description.1: Disturb the depths of the Abyssal Realm and annihilate its parasite,
endereyes.rogue.name: Rogue Eye
endereyes.rogue.description.1: A simple task! Solve the puzzle of the Jungle Temple in the Overworld and
endereyes.sculk.name: Sculk Eye
endereyes.sculk.description.1: Below the Overworld, into the Deep Dark, the Warden sleep until hearing
endereyes.soul.name: Soul Eye
endereyes.soul.description.1: Inside the Colosseum, somewhere in the Overworld,
endereyes.soul.description.2: you must face the Bellringer. Recognize the chimes?
endereyes.undead.name: Undead Eye
endereyes.undead.description.1: On the snowy plains you will find the prison that holds Maledictus.
endereyes.void.name: Void Eye
endereyes.void.description.1: Travel far into the Abyssal Realm until you find a Ruined Citadel.
endereyes.void.description.2: In its depths dwells the Ender Guardian.
endereyes.witch.name: Witch Eye
endereyes.witch.description.1: Fight a witch and tear out her pupil. Then combine it with an Ender Pearl.
endereyes.fiery.name: Fiery Eye
endereyes.fiery.description.1: Venture into the Fire Swamp inside of the Twilight Forest
endereyes.fiery.description.2: where you will find the lair of the fearsome Hydra.
endereyes.carminite.name: Carminite Eye
endereyes.carminite.description.1: Rising ominously above the Dark Forest inside of the Twilight Forest
endereyes.carminite.description.2: is a Dark Tower. Find your way up to face Ur-Ghast.
endereyes.aurora.name: Aurora Eye
endereyes.aurora.description.1: In the desolate glaciers inside of the Twilight Forest,
endereyes.aurora.description.2: look for the Aurora Palace where the Snow Queen reigns.
